page.title: 14Relaxation in Devon
page.content: Tourists attracted to this area are those seeking a peaceful outdoor count ry holiday. Accommodation is offered through bed breakfast and evening meal at guesthouses and farmhouses or holiday cottages which are let out for self_ catering.Cream teas are available dur_ ing the summer but there are no pubs, hotels or restaurants to offer refreshment to the visitor. The main attraction is of course the outstanding natural beauty of the area which is largely unspoilt by modern developments or building.Apart from the rifle range at Budleigh which att_ racts a large number of visitors each year there are no man_made attractions _ just acres of farmland and forest, topped by the panoramic views obtained from Hingston and Blackingstone Rocks.
